item.description:
Dinner
Course One

Choose One
Louisiana Seafood Gumbo

Steak House Salad with House Vinaigrette

  Course Two Choose One
8 oz. Filet
The most tender cut of corn-fed Midwestern beef
broiled expertly to melt-in-your-mouth

12 oz. NY Strip A favorite of many steak connoisseurs. This USDA Prime cut has a full-bodied texture that is slightly firmer than a rib-eye Sizzlin' Blue Crab Cakes Three jumbo lump crab cakes served sizzling with lemon butter Stuffed Chicken Free-range chicken stuffed with a garlic-herb cheese blend roasted and finished with lemon butter and fresh thyme Your choice of one of the following personal side items: Creamed Spinach Garlic Mashed Potatoes Course Three

Duo of Berries & Cream and Chocolate Mousse Cup

Restaurant Week Featured Wines: Mezzacorona Pinot Grigio $8 Mezzacorona Cabernet Sauvignon $8

*Beverages, Tax, and Gratuity are not included*

 

COST OF THIS IS 29.95/PERSON PLUS TAX AND GRATUITY / SIGN UP FAST BECAUSE I HAVE LIMITED THIS EVENT TO ONLY 8 PEOPLE DUE TO LIMITED SPACE. WILL TRY TO INCREASE THE # IF I CAN. HOWEVER RESERVATIONS NEED TO BE MADE AHEAD OF TIME.  EATING AT RUTH CHRIS IS NOT SOMETHING YOU CAN DO FOR 29.95 BECAUSE IT IS HIGH END. BEVERAGES WILL BE ON YOUR OWN, SEPERATE BILLS. PLEASE, IF YOU SIGN UP PLAN ON ATTENDING AS WHEN I MAKE RESERVATIONS IT CAN CAUSE PROBLEMS WITH THE RESTAURANT.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: RESTAURANT WEEK
